description: Limited or extensive debridement of shoulder structures with specific orthopedic test requirements (Evidence: pg no: 6, L240-L277)
scope: Limited or extensive debridement (Evidence: pg no: 6, L240)

documentation: Individual demonstrates functionally limited range of motion OR measurable loss of strength (Evidence: pg no: 6, L245-L248)

ONE OR MORE positive orthopedic tests/signs including Drop Arm Test, Painful Arc Test, Jobe or Empty Can Test, External Rotation Lag Sign, Lift-Off Test, Belly-Press Test, Cross Body Adduction Test, Resisted AC Joint Extension Test, Neer Impingement Test, Hawkins-Kennedy Impingement Test, O'Brien's Test, Biceps Load Test, Clunk Test, Anterior Slide Test, Compression Rotation Test, Speed's Test (Evidence: pg no: 6-7, L249-L265)
Failure of provider-directed non-surgical management for at least three (3) months in duration (Evidence: pg no: 7, L271-L272)
Advanced diagnostic imaging study (e.g., MRI, CT) demonstrates underlying pathology which correlates with the individual's reported symptoms and physical exam findings (Evidence: pg no: 7, L273-L274)

Other potential pathological conditions have been excluded including fracture, thoracic outlet syndrome, brachial plexus disorders, referred neck pain, and advanced glenohumeral osteoarthritis (Evidence: pg no: 7, L275-L277)

exclusions: Any other indication or condition (Evidence: pg no: 7, L279-L280)

codes.description: Arthroscopy, shoulder, surgical; debridement, limited, 1 or 2 discrete structures (Evidence: pg no: 13, L562-L565)
Arthroscopy, shoulder, surgical; debridement, extensive, 3 or more discrete structures (Evidence: pg no: 13, L566-L569)

notes: Requires specific positive orthopedic tests and correlation with imaging findings (Evidence: pg no: 6-7, L249-L274)
